body: So I got another problem, not with the code, but with trying to open  the minecraft folder for eclipse. All I need is where to go to get it, I accdently closed it out but It was all saved, Any Ideas of where to go? Btw It has like packages and all the other stuff :(

replies.body: If you're trying to find your "Minecraft Folder" (where all your data is saved.) You find your start button, and type in %appdata%. Then click the Minecraft Folder, your there! >>>If your looking for the folder.
replies.body_tagged: If you're trying to find your "Minecraft Folder" (where all your data is saved.) You find your start button, and type in %appdata%. Then click the Minecraft Folder, your there! >>>If your looking for the folder.
